content: any further details and information errata dutch version - part 3 round 4 - start in 6th stitch instead of 7th part 8 - round 10 - instead of rv-v it needs to be rv-a errata on all versions - part 6 - round 9 - make 1sc-ch2-single_crochet instead of 2sc-ch2-2sc after 4th february 2020 the pattern is updated from above errata s 12/02/20 errata on all versions - part 7 - round 12 the fpsc is made around the stitch of round 11 instead of round 10
